Library.Name: #BreakpointLogging
Library.DefaultResolution: Breakpoint Logging Functions, 3.5.5.0 (3S - Smart Software Solutions GmbH)

Library.Name: #BreakpointLogging
Library.DefaultResolution: Breakpoint Logging Functions, 3.5.5.0 (3S - Smart Software Solutions GmbH)

Parameter.Name: IPAddress
Parameter.Description: Configure IP Address of the Controller on the EtherNet bus (IP).

Parameter.Name: SubnetMask
Parameter.Description: Configure IP Address of the Controller on the EtherNet bus (Mask).

Parameter.Name: GatewayAddress
Parameter.Description: Configure IP Address of the Controller on the EtherNet bus (Gateway).

Parameter.Name: TransferRate
Parameter.Description: Configure Bus speed of the EtherNet.

Parameter.Name: IPConfigMode
Parameter.Description: Configure the method this device uses for obtaining an IP address.

Parameter.Name: DeviceName
Parameter.Description: Configure the Network-/Device- Name, e.g. for DHCP addressing Use case.

Parameter.Name: WebServer
Parameter.Description: Configure activation of WEB server

Parameter.Name: MACAddress
Parameter.Description: MAC Address

Parameter.Name: NetworkInterfaceName
Parameter.Description: Configure Name of Network Interface

Parameter.Name: EtherNetProtocol
Parameter.Description: Configure EtherNet Protocol (Ethernet2 or 802.3 frames)

Parameter.Name: NetworkInterfaceName
Parameter.Description: Configure Name of Network Interface - Unicode

Parameter.Name: SaveCommunicationSettings
Parameter.Description: TRUE: IP, SubnetMask and GatewayAddress will be set to the configured values at the PLC's OS!

Parameter.Name: IPAddress
Parameter.Description: Actual IP Address of the Controller on the EtherNet bus (IP).

Parameter.Name: SubnetMask
Parameter.Description: Actual IP Address of the Controller on the EtherNet bus (Mask).

Parameter.Name: GatewayAddress
Parameter.Description: Actual IP Address of the Controller on the EtherNet bus (Gateway).

Parameter.Name: TransferRate
Parameter.Description: Actual Bus speed of the EtherNet.

Parameter.Name: IPConfigMode
Parameter.Description: Actual method this device uses for obtaining an IP address.

Parameter.Name: DeviceName
Parameter.Description: Actual Network-/Device- Name, e.g. for DHCP addressing Use case.

Parameter.Name: WebServer
Parameter.Description: Actual activation state of WEB server

Parameter.Name: NetworkStatus
Parameter.Description: Actual network status.

Parameter.Name: ModuleStatus
Parameter.Description: Actual module status.

Parameter.Name: MACAddress
Parameter.Description: Actual MAC Address.

Parameter.Name: NetworkInterfaceName
Parameter.Description: Actual Name of Network Interface

Parameter.Name: EtherNetProtocol
Parameter.Description: Actual configured EtherNet Protocol

Parameter.Name: WebserverVisible
Parameter.Description: enable/disable configuration of parameter WebServer

Parameter.Name: NetworkInterfaceVisible
Parameter.Description: enable/disable configuration of parameter NetworkInterfaceName

Parameter.Name: OnlineStatusScreenEnabled
Parameter.Description: enable/disable Online-Status Screen

Parameter.Name: ReadOnlyNIC
Parameter.Description: NIC whose communication settings shall not be changed.

Parameter.Name: UseAsyncTask
Parameter.Description: Use async task to check the network connectivity. This relieves the bus cycle task.

Parameter.Name: Dummy Parameter
Parameter.Description: Dummy Parameter
